sourcesContent:
<form>
    <mat-card>
        <mat-card-title>Basic Information</mat-card-title>
        <mat-form-field>
            <input matInput placeholder="Coffee name" name="coffee"
            [(ngModel)]="coffee.name" />
        </mat-form-field>
        <mat-form-field>
            <input matInput placeholder="Place name" name="place"
            [(ngModel)]="coffee.place" />
        </mat-form-field>
        <mat-form-field *ngIf="coffee.location">
            <input matInput placeholder="Address" name="address"
            [(ngModel)]="coffee.location.address" />
        </mat-form-field>
        <mat-form-field *ngIf="coffee.location">
            <input matInput placeholder="City" name="city"
            [(ngModel)]="coffee.location.city" />
        </mat-form-field>
    </mat-card>
    
    <mat-card>
        <mat-card-subtitle>Overall Rating</mat-card-subtitle>
        <mat-slider min="0" max="10" showTickMarks discrete name="coffee.rating" [(ngModel)]="coffee.rating"
        step="1"><input matSliderThumb></mat-slider>
        <mat-slide-toggle #tastingSelector (change)="tastingRatingChecked(tastingSelector.checked)">Tasting Rating</mat-slide-toggle>
        <section *ngIf="tastingSelector.checked" id="tasting-rating">
            <label>Aroma</label>
            <mat-slider max="10" thumbLabel name="aroma" [(ngModel)]="coffee.tastingRating.aroma"
            tickInterval="1"></mat-slider>
            <label>Body</label>
            <mat-slider max="10" thumbLabel name="body" [(ngModel)]="coffee.tastingRating.body"
            tickInterval="1"></mat-slider>
            <label>Flavor</label>
            <mat-slider max="10" thumbLabel name="flavor" [(ngModel)]="coffee.tastingRating.flavor"
            tickInterval="1"></mat-slider>
            <label>Intensity</label>
            <mat-slider max="10" thumbLabel name="intensity" [(ngModel)]="coffee.tastingRating.intensity"
            tickInterval="1"></mat-slider>
            <label>Sweetness</label>
            <mat-slider max="10" thumbLabel name="sweetness" [(ngModel)]="coffee.tastingRating.sweetness"
            tickInterval="1"></mat-slider>
            <label>Aftertaste</label>
            <mat-slider max="10" thumbLabel name="afterTaste" [(ngModel)]="coffee.tastingRating.afterTaste"
            tickInterval="1"></mat-slider>
        </section>
    
    </mat-card>
    <mat-card>
        <mat-card-subtitle>Coffee type</mat-card-subtitle>   
            <mat-select placeholder="Coffee type" name="coffe type" [(ngModel)]="coffee.type">>              
                <mat-option *ngFor="let type of types" [value]="type">{{type}}</mat-option>
            </mat-select>
    </mat-card> 
        <mat-card>
            <textarea matInput placeholder="Notes" name="notes"
            [(ngModel)]="coffee.notes" ></textarea>
    </mat-card>
        <mat-card>{{ coffee | json }}</mat-card>
        <mat-card>
            <button mat-raised-button (click)="cancel()">Cancel</button>
            <button mat-raised-button color="accent" (click)="save()">Save</button>
        </mat-card>   
    </form>
